mapper.insert: insert into login (SystemNo, Name, LoginIP, LoginBrowser, OfflineTime) values (#{systemno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginbrowser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{offlinetime,jdbcType=CHAR})
mapper.select: select SystemNo, Name, LoginIP, LoginBrowser, OfflineTime from login
